description.en: Learners are directed to notice special needs, taught to assess and document a child's development in different areas. They are taught to consider the suitability of growth environment conditions and the difficulty level of educational activities for children with special needs. Teaching specifics are outlined according to the types of special needs.
description.et: Õppijat suunatakse märkama erivajadusi, õpetatakse hindama ja dokumenteerima lapse arengut erinevates valdkondades. Õpetatakse arvestama kasvukeskkonna tingimuste ja õppetegevuse raskusastme sobivust erivajadustega lapsele. Tuuakse välja õpetamise spetsiifika erivajaduste liikide kaupa.

objectives.en: To develop skills for noticing children's developmental special needs and individual peculiarities; to create a learning and growth-friendly environment for children's development; to plan educational and developmental activities.
objectives.et: Arendada oskusi laste arenguliste erivajaduste ja individuaalsete iseärasuste märkamiseks; laste arenguks soodsa õpi- ja kasvukeskkonna loomiseks; õppe- ja kasvatustegevuste planeerimiseks.

learning_outcomes.en: Can notice the special needs of a child and assess their overall developmental level in different areas;
learning_outcomes.et: Oskab märgata lapse erivajadusi ja hinnata tema üldist arengutaset erinevates valdkondades;

learning_outcomes.en: Can create a learning and growth-friendly environment in kindergarten and plan educational activities based on children's developmental levels;
learning_outcomes.et: Oskab luua lasteaias laste arengule soodsa õpi- ja kasvukeskkonna ning planeerida õppe- ja kasvatustegevusi laste arengutasemest lähtuvalt;

learning_outcomes.en: Knows how to collaborate with colleagues and support specialists to assist children with special needs and knows how to counsel parents;
learning_outcomes.et: Teab, kuidas teha koostööd kolleegidega ja tugispetsilistidega erivajadusega lapse toetamiseks ja kuidas nõustada lapsevanemaid;

learning_outcomes.en: Is familiar with legislation related to special educational needs.

independent_work.et: Ühe erivajaduse liigi ülevaade ja ettekanne (rühmatöö). Juhised iseseisva töö tegemiseks antakse esimeses loengus.
